item.title: 以下是美国 10 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周三公布的 10 月份美国消费者价格指数报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the October US consumer price index report released Wednesday:】

item.title: OpenAI 称美国盟友应在人工智能领域合作与中国竞争
item.description: OpenAI 呼吁美国及其盟国共同努力，支持开发人工智能系统和与中国竞争所需的基础设施。【原文：OpenAI is calling for the US and its allies to work together to support the infrastructure needed to develop artificial intelligence systems and compete with China.】

item.title: 英国官员警告政府特朗普贸易协议面临的障碍
item.description: 英国官员警告工党政府的部长们，唐纳德-特朗普执政期间与美国的贸易谈判因其提出的关税提议、不愿参与气候相关问题以及在进入公共采购市场方面的分歧而受阻。【原文：UK officials have warned ministers in the Labour government that previous trade talks with the US under Donald Trump were held up by his offer on tariffs, unwillingness to engage on climate-related issues and disagreements over access to public procurement markets.】

item.title: 法国电网称出口限制将很快结束，从三月起恢复
item.description: 制约法国电力出口的电网限制将于本周末结束，但随着法国电网运营商开始新的维护工作，电网限制可能会在明年 3 月或 4 月恢复。【原文：Grid limitations that constrained France’s electricity exports are due to finish by the end of the week, but may resume from next March or April as the country’s network operator starts new maintenance.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 将出售 10 亿美元电信公司股权以寻求现金支持
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在出售其在王国主要移动电话运营商中的部分股份，试图为政府的万亿美元经济转型计划筹集资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is selling part of its stake in the kingdom’s main mobile-phone operator as it tries to raise cash for the government’s trillion-dollar economic transformation plan.】

item.title: 美联储12月降息后，交易员押注通胀保持稳定
item.description: 国债反弹，原因是在通胀数据符合预期后，交易员增加了美联储下月将再降息四分之一点的赌注。【原文：Treasuries rallied as traders added to wagers that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by another quarter point next month after in-line inflation data.】

item.title: 比特币反弹后，微策略推动美国可转换债券收益率上升
item.description: 在比特币历史性上涨的背景下，微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. is powering returns in the $310 billion market for US convertible bonds on the back of Bitcoin’s historic advance.】

item.title: Charter 将通过全股票交易收购自由宽带
item.description: Charter Communications Inc. 同意以全股票交易的方式收购 Liberty Broadband Corp.【原文：Charter Communications Inc. agreed to buy Liberty Broadband Corp. in an all-stock transaction.】

item.title: 沙特 Neom 公司获得意大利出口信贷机构 Sace 30 亿美元贷款担保
item.description: 意大利国家保险和金融集团将向沙特阿拉伯提供 30 亿美元的贷款担保，以帮助沙特开发一个规模庞大的未来主义大城市。【原文：Italy’s state insurance and financial group will grant Saudi Arabia $3 billion in loan guarantees to help the kingdom develop a sprawling futuristic megacity.】

item.title: 美国核心 CPI 连续三个月保持坚挺，涨幅为 0.3
item.description: 10 月份，衡量美国基本通胀率的一项指标依然坚挺，凸显了美联储官员在努力实现其目标过程中面临的持续风险。【原文：A measure of underlying US inflation remained firm in October, underscoring the ongoing risks Federal Reserve officials face in trying to achieve their target.】

item.title: 暴风雨即将来临，香港经纪商为首个台风交易日做好准备
item.description: 本周四，香港证券交易所将首次在恶劣天气中继续开市。【原文：For the first time on Thursday, Hong Kong’s stock exchange will keep its markets open through severe weather.】

item.title: 肖尔茨顾问公司下调德国明年经济增长预期
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）的独立专家小组称，由于潜在问题加剧了周期性疲软，德国经济明年将很难实现增长。【原文：Germany’s economy will hardly grow next year as underlying problems add to cyclical weakness, according to Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s independent panel of experts.】

item.title: 瑞士制造法每年带来 16 亿美元的商业收益
item.description: 一项由政府资助的研究发现，规定只有瑞士制造的产品才能使用瑞士形象进行销售的法律每年为瑞士公司带来约 14 亿瑞士法郎（16 亿美元）的收益。【原文：Laws prescribing that only products made in Switzerland can be marketed using Swiss images bring some 1.4 billion francs ($1.6 billion) per year to the country’s companies, a government-sponsored study found.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜刺激美元需求，赞比亚准备应对冲击
item.description: 赞比亚央行行长警告说，唐纳德-特朗普在大选中获胜所引发的美元反弹可能会对赞比亚经济造成压力，并激励赞比亚努力减少对美元的依赖。【原文：Zambia’s central bank governor warned that a rally in the dollar fanned by Donald Trump’s election victory may place strain on its economy and has galvanized efforts to reduce its reliance on the greenback.】

item.title: 阿波罗结构信贷业务 Atlas SP 任命 Lathrop 为首席执行官
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份声明，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Atlas SP Partners, the structured-credit unit of Apollo Global Management Inc., has named Carey Lathrop as its chief executive officer, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg, three months after the exit of his predecessor Jay Kim.】

item.title: Accel 牵头为 Chaos Industries 筹集 1.45 亿美元资金
item.description: 防务初创企业 Chaos Industries 在由 Accel 领投的 B 轮融资中获得了 1.45 亿美元的资金，比其首次融资获得的资金翻了一番还多。【原文：Defense startup Chaos Industries landed $145 million in a Series B round led by Accel, more than doubling what it got in its initial fundraising effort.】

item.title: D.E. Shaw 为最新碱业私人信贷基金融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 投资公司 D.E. Shaw & Co. 为其最新的私人信贷基金筹集了 10 亿美元的承付款，计划购买公司债、结构性债务以及合成证券化资产。【原文：Investment firm D.E. Shaw & Co. raised $1 billion in commitments to its latest private credit fund, with a plan to buy assets in corporate and structured debt as well as synthetic securitizations.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜促使欧洲央行预测人员追问利率还能跌多少
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜，这让一些预测人士质疑，随着其贸易关税威胁的兑现，欧洲央行是否需要将借贷成本恢复到高度刺激性的水平。【原文：Donald Trump’s election win is leading some forecasters to question if the European Central Bank will need to return borrowing costs toward highly stimulative levels as his threat of trade tariffs materializes.】

item.title: 审计员辞职后，超微再次推迟申报
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc., the troubled server maker whose auditor resigned last month, delayed yet another filing as it continues to search for a new accounting firm.】

item.title: Petroineos 购买了至少自 2008 年以来最多的基准北海石油
item.description: 石油交易商 Petroineos 在北海市场上以至少 16 年来最快的速度抢购基准原油，这让竞争对手对这股抢购热潮感到惊讶。【原文：Oil trader Petroineos has been snapping up benchmark crude in the North Sea market at the fastest pace in at least 16 years, leaving rivals surprised by the flurry of activity.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份 CPI 报告分析
item.description: 美国新墨西哥州圣达菲的一名购物者。摄影师：凯特-丁利/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A shopper in Santa Fe, New Mexico, US. Photographer: Cate Dingley/Bloomberg】

item.title: 铜冶炼厂受到供应紧张和需求疲软的冲击
item.description:
在中国举行的一次行业会议上，处理器发现自己在与矿商和买家讨价还价时处于弱势地位。【原文：

Processors are finding themselves in weak bargaining positions against both miners and buyers at an industry gathering in China.

】

item.title: 对冲基金的赌注取决于法院是否驳回卡车司机的养老金诉求
item.description: 在极少数情况下，股东们会发现他们的公司死了可能比活着更值钱。去年破产的美国标志性卡车运输公司 Yellow Corp.【原文：On rare occasions, shareholders discover their company might be worth more dead than alive. One hedge fund is betting its long shot, legal gambit over Yellow Corp., the iconic American trucking firm that went bust last year, will lead to just such a windfall.】

item.title: 借贷成本下降，欧洲紧随美国债务销售复苏
item.description: 欧洲债务市场正在重拾美国的辉煌，由于借款人抓住了接近三年低点的融资成本，债务销售出现反弹。【原文：Europe’s debt market is picking up where the US left off, with a debt sales rebound as borrowers seize on funding costs that are near a three-year low.】

item.title: Coterra 将通过总额 40 亿美元的交易收购二叠纪资产
item.description: 得克萨斯州页岩油生产商 Coterra Energy Inc. 已与两家控股公司达成协议，将以 39.5 亿美元的价格收购二叠纪盆地的资产。【原文：Texas shale-oil producer Coterra Energy Inc. has reached agreements with two closely-held companies to buy assets in the Permian Basin for $3.95 billion.】

item.title: 欧洲初创科技公司因 Lilium 和 Northvolt 的 "灾难 "而踉跄
item.description: 欧洲的高科技公司正陷入困境，而潜在的救世主却很难找到。但首先...【原文：Europe's deep tech companies are struggling, and potential saviors are hard to find. But first...】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美国的通胀观点已被锚定— 真的吗？
item.description: 我是塞西尔-道拉特（Cécile Daurat），美国经济学编辑。今天，我们将与莫莉-史密斯（Molly Smith）一起探讨长期通胀预期。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Cécile Daurat, an economics editor in the US. Today, along with Molly Smith, we’re looking at long-term inflation expectations. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 微软游戏主管仍在寻求收购，并看好未来增长前景
item.description:
Phil Spencer 正在计划如何进入手持设备和移动商店市场并与之合作

。【原文：

Phil Spencer is planning how to enter and partner in the handheld device and mobile-store markets

】

item.title: 亚马逊让残疾员工更难在家工作
item.description:
新的 "多级领导审查 "可能需要数周时间，这引发了人们的担忧，担心受影响的企业员工会放弃并辞职。【原文：

New ‘multilevel leader review’ can take weeks and has prompted concerns that affected corporate workers will give up and quit.

】

item.title: 一月份将成为全球贸易的关键月份
item.description: 当世界上许多国家都在为 1 月 20 日的美国就职日做准备时，这个月还有一个日子给全球经济带来了不确定性。【原文：While much of the world braces for US Inauguration Day on Jan. 20, there’s another date that month that’s heaping uncertainty on the global economy.】
